body_html: @martinwicke There's specific logic to fix those differences, which is why the tests pass in both Python 2 and Python 3: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/23006/files#diff-66076c6ed184cb1cc7997df09d0b1c6fR50. I'm not sure why the copybara test introduces new failures that the normal Python 2/3 unit tests don't catch.
